20110127160359.000|20110127160403.000|CC1|>> RIGHT.                       
20110127160403.000|20110127160404.000|CC1|IT IS A SMALL NUMBER.           
20110127160404.000|20110127160405.000|CC1|34 OF THE CASES WERE IN THE     
20110127160405.000|20110127160409.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.                  
20110127160409.000|20110127160409.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:04:00 of 1:00:00
20110127160409.000|20110127160410.000|CC1|IT'S A VERY RARE FORM OF CANCER.
20110127160410.000|20110127160411.000|CC1|THE FDA PUT OUT AN ALERT TO     
20110127160411.000|20110127160411.000|CC1|DOCTORS AND PATIENTS, TO        
20110127160411.000|20110127160412.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND THE PROBLEM BETTER.  
20110127160412.000|20110127160412.000|CC1|ARE THERE MORE CASES THEY       
20110127160412.000|20110127160415.000|CC1|HAVEN'T HEARD OF?               
20110127160415.000|20110127160416.000|CC1|OR IS THIS THE FULL EXTENT OF   
20110127160416.000|20110127160416.000|CC1|THE PROBLEM?                    
20110127160416.000|20110127160419.000|CC1|>> THIS IS NOT BREAST CANCER.   
20110127160419.000|20110127160421.000|CC1|IT'S A SYSTEMIC FORM OF CANCER, 
20110127160421.000|20110127160422.000|CC1|CALLED ALCL.                    
20110127160422.000|20110127160423.000|CC1|HOW TREATABLE IS IT?            
20110127160423.000|20110127160424.000|CC1|>> IT'S A VERY TREATABLE FORM OF
20110127160424.000|20110127160425.000|CC1|CANCER.                         
20110127160425.000|20110127160430.000|CC1|IT'S A TYPE OF LYMPHOMA.        
20110127160430.000|20110127160433.000|CC1|IT'S THE CANCER OF LYMPH NODES  
20110127160433.000|20110127160434.000|CC1|OF YOUR GLANDS.                 
20110127160434.000|20110127160435.000|CC1|IF IT'S PICKED UP EARLIER, IT'S 
20110127160435.000|20110127160435.000|CC1|READILY CURABLE.                
20110127160435.000|20110127160436.000|CC1|A LOT OF WOMEN ARE GOING TO HEAR
20110127160436.000|20110127160436.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20110127160436.000|20110127160437.000|CC1|AND THEY'RE GOING TO BE         
20110127160437.000|20110127160438.000|CC1|FRIGHTENED IF THEY HAVE BREAST  
20110127160438.000|20110127160438.000|CC1|IMPLANTS.                       
20110127160438.000|20110127160439.000|CC1|I WANT TO PUT IT IN PERSPECTIVE.
20110127160439.000|20110127160440.000|CC1|YOUR CHANCE OF GETTING STRUCK BY
20110127160440.000|20110127160445.000|CC1|LIGHTNING IS GREATER.           
20110127160445.000|20110127160447.000|CC1|THIS IS A VERY RARE EVENT.      
20110127160447.000|20110127160448.000|CC1|IF YOU HAVE A BREAST IMPLANT IN,
20110127160448.000|20110127160449.000|CC1|THE GOAL ISN'T TO GO TO YOUR    
20110127160449.000|20110127160449.000|CC1|DOCTOR AND HAVING THIS TAKEN    
20110127160449.000|20110127160450.000|CC1|OUT.                            
20110127160450.000|20110127160451.000|CC1|THE IMPORTANT THING IS, IF YOU  
20110127160451.000|20110127160453.000|CC1|HAVE SIGNS.                     
20110127160453.000|20110127160453.000|CC1|SWELLING OF YOUR BREAST OR PAIN.
20110127160453.000|20110127160455.000|CC1|DON'T IGNORE IT.                
20110127160455.000|20110127160457.000|CC1|SEE YOUR DOCTOR TO SEE IF THIS  
20110127160457.000|20110127160458.000|CC1|IS SOMETHING DEVELOPING IN YOU.

20110127160459.000|20110127160502.000|CC1|WOMEN WHO ARE DEVELOPING THE    
20110127160502.000|20110127160503.000|CC1|RARE CANCER HAD BREAST IMPLANTS

20110127160515.000|20110127160515.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:05:00 of 1:00:00
20110127160513.000|20110127160517.000|CC1|DON'T IGNORE THOSE SIGNS.

20110127160517.000|20110127160521.000|CC1|SOMETHING YOU CAN DO ABOUT THIS.

20110127160536.000|20110127160537.000|CC1|EVERYONE'S DECISION WHETHER TO  
20110127160537.000|20110127160539.000|CC1|VEY BREFRT IMPLANT.             
20110127160539.000|20110127160540.000|CC1|>> AND THE REGISTRY THAT THE FDA
